name: DeepScape
description:
DeepScape is an underwater 2D survival game.

You are stranded in deep waters, survive and keep the colony alive.

You control DeepBot, an underwater robot unit.

You must grab Kelp and bring it in the Deposit Zone.

This will add Oxygen to the base and keep your people alive.

Care for the squid ... and the jellyfish ...

Controls:

Move: Arrow Keys / D-Pad on a controller

Escape: Space Bar / (X) on a controller
